name: Github User Database
desc: A github userbase created with vanilla JavaScript, includes the github api to search for users, see their repective branches, repo's etc. also includes the youtube Api allowing you to search for youtube videos, see channels etc..

name: A Developer Quiz
desc: A Developer quiz made with a WIP quiz API
